Majority.from sentence: Majority is a basic baseline method , which assigns the largest sentiment polarity in the training set to each sample in the test set .

LSTM.from sentence: LSTM uses one LSTM network to model the sentence , and the last hidden state is used as the sentence representation for the final classification .

TD - LSTM.from sentence: TD - LSTM uses two LSTM networks to model the preceding and following contexts surrounding the aspect term .

AT - LSTM.from sentence: AT - LSTM first models the sentence via a LSTM model .

ATAE - LSTM.from sentence: ATAE - LSTM further extends AT - LSTM by appending the aspect embedding into each word vector .

IAN.from sentence: IAN uses two LSTM networks to model the sentence and aspect term respectively .
